element.name: Helium
element.appearance: colorless gas, exhibiting a red-orange glow when placed in a high-voltage electric field
element.summary: Helium is a chemical element with symbol He and atomic number 2. It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, inert, monatomic gas that heads the noble gas group in the periodic table. Its boiling and melting points are the lowest among all the elements.
